6.7.6 Miscellaneous OLE-SERVER module classes and functions

istream-rewrite

Function

Signature

istream-rewrite stream => ()

Arguments

stream
An instance of <storage-istream>.

Values

None.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Rewind the OLE data stream to its beginning and set its size to 0 in preparation for writing new data.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
